text: 27|10|haey chaur anak baoh dambng robsa anak choh .  haey nowpel del  keat bankheunh vea thveu chalnea dauchchea psa  keat ka rt tralbtowvinh  daoy min ngeak kraoy . ( pelnoh trong mean bantoul tha) ao mou sa. chaur  anak kom phyokhlach aoy saoh  pitabrakd nasa anakneasar min phyokhlach  nowchampohmoukh yeung laey .
